name: Adrift (Jamming Games, Bat Ship, CROYBOY2000)
description:
Miskatonic, a freighter out of Valparaíso, Chile went missing on the night of September 13, 1987 returning from a routine resupply to a reasearch team stationed at remote outpost Plateu Station, Antarctica.

All 14 of her crewmen were lost at sea and presumed dead.

Play as one of the lost crewmen and learn the horrifying truth about what happened that night.

Made for Scream Zone Game Jam X (Scream Seas) in 1 week.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • [E] - Interact, hold for longer effects like repairing.

WARNING: The Web version of the game has been simplified significantly due to platform limitations.  Consider it a "demo" version of the game.  If you like what you see, the downloadable versions are significantly smoother, with more polish, less bugs, and an overall better experience.  Thanks!

As always we've done our best to test and polish the game as much as possible in the time allowed, but if you experience anything you think is not intended, feel free to leave a comment below.  We'll try and fix any glaring issues promptly!
